医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
交互式图谱揭示了多发性骨髓瘤的免疫变化多发性骨髓瘤 (MM) 是一种无法治愈的血癌，会导致免疫力下降、骨骼损伤和其他严重的健康问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Interactive-atlas-unveils-immune-changes-in-multiple-myeloma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Interactive-atlas-unveils-immune-changes-in-multiple-myeloma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=743946d9-079b-4ee7-8752-dd49c9226945 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 13:14:00 -0500 Interactive atlas unveils immune changes in multiple myeloma
川崎病的诊断、风险分类和治疗的最新进展根据美国心脏协会旗舰同行评审期刊《循环》今天发表的一项新的科学声明，心脏成像技术和风险分类的进步改善了川崎病患者的诊断、初始治疗和长期管理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Update-on-diagnosis-risk-classification-and-treatment-of-Kawasaki-Disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Update-on-diagnosis-risk-classification-and-treatment-of-Kawasaki-Disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=806feaff-1fd6-44c5-a12e-5385380c8129 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 13:02:53 -0500 Update on diagnosis, risk classification and treatment of Kawasaki Disease
科学家们担心，如果允许小罗伯特·肯尼迪“疯狂”，公共健康的下一步会发生什么联邦卫生机构的许多科学家怀着恐惧和不确定性等待着唐纳德·特朗普第二届政府，因为这位当选总统将如何调和其团队领导人之间截然不同的理念。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Scientists-fear-whate28099s-next-for-public-health-if-RFK-Jr-is-allowed-to-e28098go-wilde28099.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Scientists-fear-whate28099s-next-for-public-health-if-RFK-Jr-is-allowed-to-e28098go-wilde28099.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f51d48f-0a45-4b09-945c-e709848e3055 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 12:48:05 -0500 Scientists fear what’s next for public health if RFK Jr. is allowed to ‘go wild’
研究强调空气污染是自闭症风险的关键环境因素空气污染是自闭症的一个关键环境风险因素，通过神经炎症、氧化应激和表观遗传变化影响神经发育。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Study-highlights-air-pollution-as-key-environmental-factor-in-autism-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Study-highlights-air-pollution-as-key-environmental-factor-in-autism-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72518970-4302-4f3d-b268-1d6a2d9aed1f Thu, 14 Nov 2024 08:38:00 -0500 Study highlights air pollution as key environmental factor in autism risk
维生素 D 可以降低肥胖老年人的血压补充维生素 D3 和钙可降低老年人、超重人群的血压，尤其是体重指数较高且患有高血压的人群。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Vitamin-D-may-lower-blood-Pressure-in-older-people-with-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Vitamin-D-may-lower-blood-Pressure-in-older-people-with-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a91352d7-da65-4c01-b5ed-4dc76187c4a5 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 08:33:00 -0500 Vitamin D may lower blood pressure in older people with obesity
新研究揭示体重指数对疾病发病机制的影响该研究强调了体重指数在调节疾病遗传风险中的作用，表明其与心力衰竭和骨关节炎等疾病之间存在复杂的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/BMIs-influence-on-disease-pathogenesis-uncovered-in-new-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/BMIs-influence-on-disease-pathogenesis-uncovered-in-new-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ac1a9f1-682e-4042-afc5-64e995739e37 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 08:13:00 -0500 BMI's influence on disease pathogenesis uncovered in new research
创新的尿液检测可以提高胰腺癌的生存率创新的尿液 miRNA 分析显示了早期胰腺癌检测的潜力，具有高精度和灵敏度，改变了筛查实践。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Innovative-urine-test-could-improve-pancreatic-cancer-survival-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Innovative-urine-test-could-improve-pancreatic-cancer-survival-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5abea4d9-9686-430b-b611-4ea2953e44c3 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 08:06:00 -0500 Innovative urine test could improve pancreatic cancer survival rates
研究人员在可吸入 mRNA 药物方面取得进展大多数人不喜欢注射治疗或疫苗。因此，研究人员正在努力创造更多的药物，例如由信使 RNA (mRNA) 制成的可喷雾和吸入的药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Researchers-make-progress-toward-inhalable-mRNA-medicines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241114/Researchers-make-progress-toward-inhalable-mRNA-medicines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bbe8d007-9396-47f2-95b0-0fa452891f69 Thu, 14 Nov 2024 07:54:02 -0500 Researchers make progress toward inhalable mRNA medicines
